article_title: New York Fed’s Statement on Overnight Reverse Repurchase Agreements
article_text:
The following is the Federal Reserve Bank of New York’s statement regarding overnight reverse repurchase agreements:

December 16, 2015

During its meeting on December 15–16, 2015, the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) directed the...
